oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mt. Zion MB Decaturville: fieldnotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fieldnotes on Mt. Zion Missionary Baptist Church. The notes document the location of the church and provide a brief sketch of the church in relation to its cemetery.
Mt. Zion Missionary Baptist Church is rural African American church in Decaturville, Tennessee. The current building was constructed in 1950.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
Churches ; Field notes
